header.abstract: The Thoreau Club (Lebanon, Ky.) records (dated 1895-2018, undated, 1.8 cubic feet; 6 boxes) primarily comprise meeting minutes, member lists, programs and invitations, cards and correspondence, books, pamphlets, and photographs created and collected by the Lebanon, Kentucky women's literary club, founded in 1895.

descriptive_summary.author: Kaitlyn Moran
descriptive_summary.title: Thoreau Club (Lebanon, Ky.) records
descriptive_summary.arrangement: Collection is arranged into five series by format.
descriptive_summary.prefercite: 2017ms057: [identification of item], Thoreau Club (Lebanon, Ky.) records, 1895-2018, undated, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: The Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky, founded in 1895 by Lucy Cleaver McElroy, Lite Montgomery, Minnie McElroy, and Mamie Cleaver. Named after Henry David Thoreau because the founding members wanted it to be named after an outstanding American author, the object of the club is the mutual improvement of its members in literature, art, science, and the vital interests of the day. It is the oldest literary club in Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Thoreau Club (Lebanon, Ky.) records (dated 1895-2018, undated; 1.8 cubic feet; 6 boxes) primarily comprise meeting minutes, member lists, programs and invitations, cards and correspondence, books, pamphlets, and photographs created and collected by the Lebanon, Kentucky women's literary club, founded in 1895.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The physical rights to the materials in this collection are held by the University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Records series (dated 1895-2018) comprises meeting minutes and a roll call book created by the Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Club materials series (dated 1898-2017) comprises Thoreau Club notes, programs, member lists, biographies, resignation letters, and speeches created by the Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Publications series (dated 1928-2005) comprises pamphlets, booklets, and stories gathered by the Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Subject files series (dated 1949-2017) comprises papers gathered and created by the Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Photographs series (dated 1982-2015, undated) comprises photographs and postcards gathered and created by the Thoreau Club of Lebanon, Kentucky.
